trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Net.WebClient.UploadProgressChanged" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Net.WebClient" />.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce i dati per l'evento <see cref="E:System.Net.WebClient.UploadProgressChanged" /> di una classe<see cref="T:System.Net.WebClient" />.

trans-unit.source: Instances of this class are passed to the <xref:System.Net.UploadProgressChangedEventHandler>.
trans-unit.target: Le istanze di questa classe vengono passate al <xref:System.Net.UploadProgressChangedEventHandler>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of bytes received.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il numero di byte ricevuti.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> value that indicates the number of bytes received.
trans-unit.target: Valore <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> che indica il numero di byte ricevuti.

trans-unit.source: Uploading data to a server may result in a download from the server.
trans-unit.target: Caricamento dati in un server può comportare un download dal server.

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose your application uploads a POST request to a Web server.
trans-unit.target: Si supponga, ad esempio, che l'applicazione carica una richiesta POST in un server Web.

trans-unit.source: The resulting download will update <xref:System.Net.UploadProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesReceived%2A> and <xref:System.Net.UploadProgressChangedEventArgs.TotalBytesToReceive%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Il download risulta aggiornerà <xref:System.Net.UploadProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesReceived%2A> e <xref:System.Net.UploadProgressChangedEventArgs.TotalBytesToReceive%2A>.

trans-unit.source: To determine what percentage of the transfer has occurred, use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per determinare la percentuale del trasferimento effettuata, utilizzare il <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: When the upload is complete, <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage%2A> will be 50%.
trans-unit.target: Quando il caricamento è completo, <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage%2A> sarà 50%.

trans-unit.source: When the download completes, <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage%2A> will be 100%.
trans-unit.target: Al termine del download, <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage%2A> sarà 100%.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of bytes sent.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il numero di byte inviati.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> value that indicates the number of bytes sent.
trans-unit.target: Valore <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> che indica il numero di byte inviati.

trans-unit.source: Uploading data to a server may result in a download from the server.
trans-unit.target: Caricamento dati in un server può comportare un download dal server.

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose your application uploads a POST request to a Web server.
trans-unit.target: Si supponga, ad esempio, che l'applicazione carica una richiesta POST in un server Web.

trans-unit.source: The resulting download will update <xref:System.Net.UploadProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesReceived%2A> and <xref:System.Net.UploadProgressChangedEventArgs.TotalBytesToReceive%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Il download risulta aggiornerà <xref:System.Net.UploadProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesReceived%2A> e <xref:System.Net.UploadProgressChangedEventArgs.TotalBytesToReceive%2A>.

trans-unit.source: To determine what percentage of the transfer has occurred, use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per determinare la percentuale del trasferimento effettuata, utilizzare il <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: When the upload is complete, <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage%2A> will be 50%.
trans-unit.target: Quando il caricamento è completo, <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage%2A> sarà 50%.

trans-unit.source: When the download completes, <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage%2A> will be 100%.
trans-unit.target: Al termine del download, <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage%2A> sarà 100%.

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of bytes in a <see cref="T:System.Net.WebClient" /> data upload operation.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il numero totale di byte in un'operazione di caricamento dei dati <see cref="T:System.Net.WebClient" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> value that indicates the number of bytes that will be received.
trans-unit.target: Valore <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> che indica il numero di byte che verranno ricevuti.

trans-unit.source: To determine the number of bytes already received, use the <xref:System.Net.DownloadProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesReceived%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per determinare il numero di byte ricevuti, utilizzare il <xref:System.Net.DownloadProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesReceived%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Uploading data to a server may result in a download from the server.
trans-unit.target: Caricamento dati in un server può comportare un download dal server.

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose your application uploads a POST request to a Web server.
trans-unit.target: Si supponga, ad esempio, che l'applicazione carica una richiesta POST in un server Web.

trans-unit.source: The resulting download will update <xref:System.Net.UploadProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesReceived%2A> and <xref:System.Net.UploadProgressChangedEventArgs.TotalBytesToReceive%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Il download risulta aggiornerà <xref:System.Net.UploadProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesReceived%2A> e <xref:System.Net.UploadProgressChangedEventArgs.TotalBytesToReceive%2A>.

trans-unit.source: To determine what percentage of the transfer has occurred, use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage%2A> property.

trans-unit.source: When the download completes, <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage%2A> will be 100%.
trans-unit.target: Al termine del download, <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage%2A> sarà 100%.

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of bytes to send.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il numero totale di byte da inviare.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> value that indicates the number of bytes that will be sent.
trans-unit.target: Valore <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> che indica il numero di byte che verranno inviati.

trans-unit.source: To determine the number of bytes already sent, use the <xref:System.Net.UploadProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesSent%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per determinare il numero di byte inviati, utilizzare il <xref:System.Net.UploadProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesSent%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Uploading data to a server may result in a download from the server.
trans-unit.target: Caricamento dati in un server può comportare un download dal server.

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose your application uploads a POST request to a Web server.
